Texts.Chs: 然而，俗人似乎对议会特别反感，认为他们是腐败的过气人物，让某种欺骗永久化。这种偏执是毫无根据且有害的。
Texts.Eng: The Grounded, however, seem to have a particular aversion to the council, regarding them as corrupt old has-beens, perpetuating some kind of deception. Such paranoia is baseless and damaging.

Texts.Chs: 观星者们统治着他们，并利用他们的飞行能力在议会和克鲁西斯之间传递信息。许多人认为断翅议会是翼族社会真正的英雄。心甘情愿地为了翼族的利益而牺牲一切，这的确是一种高尚的追求。
Texts.Eng: The Stargazers rule them, and ferry messages between the council and Kluex through their own powers of flight. Many regard the Clipped Council as the true heroes of Avian society. Willingly sacrificing everything for the good of our species, it is truly a noble pursuit.

Texts.Chs:
由翼族学者K'arn Hollowbeak著
断翅议会是凡人和观星者之间沟通的桥梁。这些殉道的翼族人是少数几个保留飞行能力的人，但他们允许克鲁克斯断掉翅膀，以便他们能够与克鲁西斯的臣民们产生共鸣。
Texts.Eng:
by K'arn Hollowbeak, Avian scholar
The Clipped Council serve as the bridge between the Flightless and the Stargazers. These martyred Avians were amongst the select few who retained the ability to fly, yet allowed Kluex to clip their wings so as to be able to empathise with his subjects.
